traits.Charge: If the sea horse moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a ram attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 7 (2d6) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 11+1d4 + 9 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.
traits.Water Breathing: The sea horse can breathe only underwater.

actions.Ram: Melee Weapon Attack: +3+1d4 + 1 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) bludgeoning damage.
